_sText:
Map is done entirely (textures + mapping) by me, except that I took idea from Mario's surf_ski_2 for CS 1.6 and wanted to make version for CS:S ... All credits go to him of course ...

This map isn't intended to be perfect from a way of textures and models, because I wanted to keep it oldschool with as least possible changes ... Although, I couldn't resist, so I added few new things ... :D

this video shows the new secret area: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hAB0atz8HQA

the password is 2805+ to unlock room with guns with trails ... :)
